name: fortify-report-extension
description: Fortify SSC Report for Azure DevOps
author: Santhosh Kumar

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-task && npm run build-tab && npm run verify-build
scripts.build-dev: npm run clean && npm run build-task-dev && npm run build-tab-dev
scripts.verify-build: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const p='dist/task'; if(!fs.existsSync(p)) throw new Error('dist/task missing!'); if(!fs.existsSync(p+'/task.js')) throw new Error('task.js missing!'); if(!fs.existsSync(p+'/task.json')) throw new Error('task.json missing!'); console.log('✓ Build verification passed');"
scripts.debug-dist: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); function listDir(dir, prefix='') { try { const items=fs.readdirSync(dir); items.forEach(item => { const fullPath=dir+'/'+item; const stat=fs.statSync(fullPath); if(stat.isDirectory()) { console.log(prefix + '📁 ' + item + '/'); listDir(fullPath, prefix + '  '); } else { console.log(prefix + '📄 ' + item + ' (' + stat.size + ' bytes)'); } }); } catch(e) { console.log(prefix + '❌ ' + e.message); } } console.log('📦 dist/ contents:'); listDir('dist');"
